trans-unit.source: Documentation is hosted at Read The Docs:
For more information, see the Pykaryote documentation.
Once the dependencies are installed, Pykaryote can be installed with:
trans-unit.target: 一旦安装了依赖关系,就可以用Pykaryote来安装。

trans-unit.source: Pykaryote is a set of tools for modeling and studying the evolution of biological complexity.
trans-unit.target: Pykaryote是一套用于模拟和研究生物复杂性进化的工具。

trans-unit.source: Pykaryote requires a number of dependencies, including Python and Open MPI. For installation instructions, see the documentation:
trans-unit.target: Pykaryote需要一些依赖性,包括Python和Open MPI。关于安装说明,请参见文档。

trans-unit.source: The main front end to Pykaryote is petri. To run a simulation with the default settings, run:
trans-unit.target: Pykaryote的主要前端是petri。要运行一个默认设置的模拟,运行。

trans-unit.source: This will save data and graphs to ~/pykaryote/comparison
trans-unit.target: 这将会把数据和图表保存到~/pykaryote/comparison。

trans-unit.source: Tools for modeling the evolution of biological complexity
trans-unit.target: 模拟生物复杂性演变的工具
